title: Authors and Citation
code: @Manual{,   title = {chromatographR},   author = {Ethan Bass},   year = {2022},   note = {version 0.3.0},   url = {https://github.com/ethanbass/chromatographR}, }

title: Import and analyze HPLC-DAD/UV data
text: chromatographR package reproducible analysis HPLC-DAD chromatographic data R.

title: Import and analyze HPLC-DAD/UV data
text: can install chromatographR GitHub using devtools package: build vignette, include argument build_vignettes=TRUE (Note: take considerably longer building package without vignette).

title: Import and analyze HPLC-DAD/UV data
text: Please see vignette included package details application chromatographR analysis HPLC data. chromatographR can now import ChemStation MassHunter file formats (using parsers included Aston package Python) well regular csv files.
